title: Dua Allahumma hassin.. when looking in the mirror authentic? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: fuad from bangladesh says the hadith when looking in the mirror the hadith is all the chains of different narrations are weak or fabricated so the prophet would never say this dua when looking at the mirror so this is not authentic however the dua of allah perfect my character as you've perfected my appearance and body this is authentic you
